summary: Higher poly poisons' meshes. Say goodbye to crooked vanilla bottles! Mod also adds new textures (optional).
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][center][color=#ff0000]This mod is [size=4][b]released [size=4][b][size=4][b]ONLY [/b][/size][/b][/size]on[/b][/size] Nexus. If you see it on other pages it's probably stolen.[/color][/center][/b][/size]

[size=3][color=#00ff00]DESCRIPTION:[/color][/size]
This mod adds higher poly poisons' meshes to your game. I also made new 1K textures, because vanilla ones are horrible (I slightly improved textures for normal potions as well).
You can use new meshes with any potions' retexture you like (I recommend using Rustic retexture or one provided with this mod, but any textures that replace vanilla ones will work).
If you are afraid that new models will impact your game's performance, but you like my textures better than vanilla, you can use them with original Bethesda models.

Before anyone asks, I'm planning to make updated version of my [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75492/?]Pretty Animated Potions and Poisons[/url] using this models, but it will take time, so please be patient :)
[size=3][b]Due to the nature of the new models (read: some strange glitch which I wasn't able to fix) [color=#6d9eeb]Pretty Potions[/color] will be only available as "thick glass bottles version" (both animated and non-animated). [/b]
[/size]
[color=#00ff00][size=3]INSTALLATION:[/size][/color]
Just put in your Data folder.

[size=3]NOT COMPATIBLE with any mod that changes poisons' meshes.

[size=2]If you would like to use any part of this mod, please contact me first. [/size][/size]
author: dailyplanet
